{"id":889319124,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1675244632,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/889319124/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Integer to English Words","memory":"7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    vector<string> LESS_THAN_20 = {\"\", \"One\", \"Two\", \"Three\", \"Four\", \"Five\", \"Six\", \"Seven\", \"Eight\", \"Nine\", \"Ten\", \"Eleven\", \"Twelve\", \"Thirteen\", \"Fourteen\", \"Fifteen\", \"Sixteen\", \"Seventeen\", \"Eighteen\", \"Nineteen\"};\n    vector<string> TENS = {\"\", \"Ten\", \"Twenty\", \"Thirty\", \"Forty\", \"Fifty\", \"Sixty\", \"Seventy\", \"Eighty\", \"Ninety\"};\n    vector<string> THOUSANDS = {\"\", \"Thousand\", \"Million\", \"Billion\"};\n\npublic:\n    string numberToWords(int num) {\n        if (num == 0) return \"Zero\";\n\n        int i = 0;\n        string words = \"\";\n\n        while (num > 0) {\n            if (num % 1000 != 0)\n                words = helper(num % 1000) + THOUSANDS[i] + \" \" + words;\n            num /= 1000;\n            i++;\n        }\n\n        string ans;\n        if(words[words.size()-2] == ' ') ans = words.substr(0, words.length() - 2);\n        else ans = words.substr(0, words.length() - 1);\n        return ans;\n\n    }\n\n    string helper(int num) {\n        if (num == 0)\n            return \"\";\n        else if (num < 20)\n            return LESS_THAN_20[num] + \" \";\n        else if (num < 100)\n            return TENS[num / 10] + \" \" + helper(num % 10);\n        else\n            return LESS_THAN_20[num / 100] + \" Hundred \" + helper(num % 100);\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-english-words","has_notes":false}
